page.title: 15PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: The chidren at Stoke Ash School play many games in the playground including football, tennis, forty-forty, British bulldog, and stuck in the mud. RULES FORTY-FORTY This is a hide and seek game. Everybody hides while the catcher counts to forty. When he spots somebody he shouts "Forty-forty I see ...." If you are caught you stand by a tree, you can go and hide again if somebody who has not been caught can sneak up and say "Forty-forty saved you." STUCK IN THE MUD Two children are it. If one of them touches you you have to stand with your arm touching the wall until somebody who is free runs under your arm, then you are free again. BRITISH BULLDOG Run over the playground without getting caught. The catcher has to pick you up and say "Bulldog 123"
